node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `searchwords` ( `word` char(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `node_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `soundex_value` char(10) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, KEY `searchindex` (`word`,`node_id`,`soundex_value`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: searchwords
